steps.title: Go to https://www.paypal.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.paypal.com in a web browser. Open your preferred web browser on your computer and go to the main PayPal website. Log in with the username and password for your PayPal account if you haven't done so already.

steps.title: Click Activity.
steps.content: Click Activity . It's at the top of the page next to the "Summary" tab.

steps.title: Select an active or recurring transaction that you want to limit.
steps.content: Select an active or recurring transaction that you want to limit. You can click on any transaction to view more information. You can tap the two date boxes in the top-left corner to change the timeframe, or you can click Advanced filters on the right side of the page to filter the transactions by type.

steps.title: Click Details.
steps.content: Click Details . It's next to the service provider's name.

steps.title: Click Edit Billing Limit under "Bill Term".
steps.content: Click Edit Billing Limit under "Bill Term".

steps.title: Enter a limit amount.
steps.content: Enter a limit amount. Enter a limit amount in dollars and cents.
